<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	attached hereto, together with (ii) any application or patent claiming priority to any such application or patent, and any substitutions, divisions, continuations, continuing prosecution applications, extensions, term restorations, renewals, or continuations-in-part of any such applications or patents issuing on any of the foregoing applications and all reexaminations, substitutions, or reissues thereof, and any and all foreign counterparts of any and all of the foregoing, in each case to the extent such patent or patent application is owned or controlled by Rosetta and licenseable by Rosetta under the terms hereof.
</FONT>
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 12PT;TEXT-INDENT:72PT;LINE-HEIGHT:100%;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 12PT;">

<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	attached hereto, which is the Mirna active pharmaceutical ingredient included in MRX34 that currently is the subject of clinical trials.

</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	&#x201D; means the gross amount, excluding [***], of consideration (whether for payment or in exchange for other goods or services) invoiced by Mirna or its Sublicensee for any Covered Sale of a Product to a Third Party, after deduction of the Qualifying Costs (defined below).
</FONT>

<DIV STYLE="MARGIN-LEFT:8.16993464052288%;MARGIN-RIGHT:8.16993464052288%;">
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 12PT;TEXT-INDENT:108PT;LINE-HEIGHT:100%;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 12PT;">
<FONT STYLE="TEXT-INDENT:0PT;MARGIN-LEFT:0PT; PADDING-RIGHT:26PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	(i)
</FONT>
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="TEXT-INDENT:0PT;MARGIN-LEFT:0PT; PADDING-RIGHT:4PT;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	&#x201C;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;TEXT-DECORATION:UNDERLINE;">
	Qualifying Costs
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	&#x201D; means the following amounts [***] by Mirna (or, as applicable, its Sublicensee):
</FONT>
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 12PT;TEXT-INDENT:144PT;LINE-HEIGHT:100%;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 12PT;">
<FONT STYLE="TEXT-INDENT:0PT;MARGIN-LEFT:0PT; PADDING-RIGHT:22PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	(1)
</FONT>
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="TEXT-INDENT:0PT;MARGIN-LEFT:0PT; PADDING-RIGHT:4PT;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	sales taxes (including value added taxes and other similar&nbsp;&nbsp;taxes) to the extent applicable to such Sale [***];
</FONT>
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 12PT;TEXT-INDENT:144PT;LINE-HEIGHT:100%;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 12PT;">
<FONT STYLE="TEXT-INDENT:0PT;MARGIN-LEFT:0PT; PADDING-RIGHT:22PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	(2)
</FONT>
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="TEXT-INDENT:0PT;MARGIN-LEFT:0PT; PADDING-RIGHT:4PT;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	discounts granted on the relevant Sale and not already&nbsp;&nbsp;reflected in the invoiced price and credits, rebates, chargebacks, and other&nbsp;&nbsp;deductions and allowances, if any, actually granted on account of price adjustments, recalls, rejections or returns of products or services previously sold, provided that, for the avoidance of doubt, a chargeback or other deduction shall not be excluded if it already has been accounted for under
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;TEXT-DECORATION:UNDERLINE;">
	Section 1.1(m)(i)(4)
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	;
</FONT>
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 12PT;TEXT-INDENT:144PT;LINE-HEIGHT:100%;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 12PT;">
<FONT STYLE="TEXT-INDENT:0PT;MARGIN-LEFT:0PT; PADDING-RIGHT:22PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	(3)
</FONT>
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="TEXT-INDENT:0PT;MARGIN-LEFT:0PT; PADDING-RIGHT:4PT;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	freight, postage and duties, and transportation charges relating to such Sale (including handling and insurance thereto) separately identified invoice or other documentation maintained in the ordinary course of business;
</FONT>
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 12PT;TEXT-INDENT:144PT;LINE-HEIGHT:100%;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 12PT;">
<FONT STYLE="TEXT-INDENT:0PT;MARGIN-LEFT:0PT; PADDING-RIGHT:22PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	(4)
</FONT>
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="TEXT-INDENT:0PT;MARGIN-LEFT:0PT; PADDING-RIGHT:4PT;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	[***].&nbsp;
</FONT>
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 12PT;LINE-HEIGHT:100%;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 12PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	For the avoidance of doubt, an amount falling into multiple categories above may not be deducted more than once.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 12PT;TEXT-INDENT:108PT;LINE-HEIGHT:100%;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 12PT;">
<FONT STYLE="TEXT-INDENT:0PT;MARGIN-LEFT:0PT; PADDING-RIGHT:24PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	(ii)
</FONT>
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="TEXT-INDENT:0PT;MARGIN-LEFT:0PT; PADDING-RIGHT:4PT;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	Mirna shall [***] any proposed excluded Qualifying Costs or other exclusions pursuant to
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;TEXT-DECORATION:UNDERLINE;">
	Section 1.1(m)(iii) through 1.1(m)(v)
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	in accordance with
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;TEXT-DECORATION:UNDERLINE;">
	Section 4.4(b)
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	.&nbsp;&nbsp;For the avoidance of doubt, amounts received by Mirna from a Sublicensee (or if the grant of a multiple tier Sublicense is permitted hereunder, received by a Sublicensee from its sub-sublicensee) that are in consideration of the grant of sublicense rights under the Licensed Patents but are not calculated based on or otherwise related to the Covered Sale of a Product, are Sublicensing Revenue and not Net Sales.
</FONT>
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 12PT;TEXT-INDENT:108PT;LINE-HEIGHT:100%;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 12PT;">
<FONT STYLE="TEXT-INDENT:0PT;MARGIN-LEFT:0PT; PADDING-RIGHT:22PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	(iii)
</FONT>
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="TEXT-INDENT:0PT;MARGIN-LEFT:0PT; PADDING-RIGHT:4PT;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	Sales between Mirna and its Affiliates or Sublicensees for resale shall be excluded from the computation of Net Sales, and no payments will be payable on such sales except where such Affiliates or Sublicensees are end users.&nbsp;
</FONT>
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 12PT;TEXT-INDENT:108PT;LINE-HEIGHT:100%;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 12PT;">
<FONT STYLE="TEXT-INDENT:0PT;MARGIN-LEFT:0PT; PADDING-RIGHT:22PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	(iv)
</FONT>
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="TEXT-INDENT:0PT;MARGIN-LEFT:0PT; PADDING-RIGHT:4PT;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	Notwithstanding the foregoing, Product provided for clinical or non-clinical research and trials or as Product samples shall be excluded from Net Sales.&nbsp;&nbsp;Product
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	provided [***].&nbsp;
</FONT>
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 12PT;TEXT-INDENT:108PT;LINE-HEIGHT:100%;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 12PT;">
<FONT STYLE="TEXT-INDENT:0PT;MARGIN-LEFT:0PT; PADDING-RIGHT:23PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	(v)
</FONT>
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="TEXT-INDENT:0PT;MARGIN-LEFT:0PT; PADDING-RIGHT:4PT;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	If a Product is Sold as part of a Combination Product (as defined below), Net Sales will be calculated by multiplying the (x) Net Sales of the Combination Product calculated as above (i.e., calculated as for a non-Combination Product) by (y) the fraction (A/(A+B)), where:
</FONT>
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-INDENT:144PT;LINE-HEIGHT:100%;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 12PT;">
<FONT STYLE="TEXT-INDENT:0PT;MARGIN-LEFT:0PT; PADDING-RIGHT:22PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	(1)
</FONT>
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="TEXT-INDENT:0PT;MARGIN-LEFT:0PT; PADDING-RIGHT:4PT;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	&#x201C;A&#x201D; is the average gross selling price during the previous calendar quarter in such country of such Product as the sole therapeutically active component; and
</FONT>
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;LINE-HEIGHT:100%;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 12PT;TEXT-INDENT:144PT;LINE-HEIGHT:100%;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 12PT;">
<FONT STYLE="TEXT-INDENT:0PT;MARGIN-LEFT:0PT; PADDING-RIGHT:22PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
</FONT>
</FONT>
</P>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="MARGIN-LEFT:8.16993464052288%;MARGIN-RIGHT:8.16993464052288%;">
<P>
<FONT SIZE="1">
</FONT>
</P>
<DIV STYLE="WIDTH:100%">
<P STYLE="MARGIN:24PT 0PT 0PT;LINE-HEIGHT:100%;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	[***] Certain information in this document has been omitted and filed separately with the Securities and Exchange Commission.&nbsp;&nbsp;Confidential treatment has been requested with respect to the omitted portions.

<DIV STYLE="MARGIN-LEFT:8.16993464052288%;MARGIN-RIGHT:8.16993464052288%;">

<P STYLE="PAGE-BREAK-AFTER:ALWAYS">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<A NAME="eolPage127"></A>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="MARGIN-LEFT:8.16993464052288%;MARGIN-RIGHT:8.16993464052288%;">
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="MARGIN-LEFT:8.16993464052288%;MARGIN-RIGHT:8.16993464052288%;">
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 12PT;TEXT-INDENT:144PT;LINE-HEIGHT:100%;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 12PT;">
<FONT STYLE="TEXT-INDENT:0PT;MARGIN-LEFT:0PT; PADDING-RIGHT:22PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	(2)
</FONT>
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="TEXT-INDENT:0PT;MARGIN-LEFT:0PT; PADDING-RIGHT:4PT;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	&#x201C;B&#x201D; is the average gross selling price during the previous calendar quarter in such country of the other therapeutically active component contained in the Combination Product.
</FONT>
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 12PT;LINE-HEIGHT:100%;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 12PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	If &#x201C;A&#x201D; or &#x201C;B&#x201D; cannot be determined by reference to non-Combination Product Sales as described above, then Net Sales will be calculated as above, but the average gross selling price in the above equation will be [***]
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	prior to the end of the accounting period in question based on[***]
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	that takes into account, in the applicable country
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	, &nbsp;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	[***] in the Combination Product.&nbsp; If [***]
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	the end of the applicable accounting period,[***].&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;As used in this
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;TEXT-DECORATION:UNDERLINE;">
	Section 1.1(m)(v)
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	, &#x201C;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;TEXT-DECORATION:UNDERLINE;">
	Combination Product
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	&#x201D; means a Product that contains one or more additional therapeutic agents (whether co-formulated or co-packaged) that are not the therapeutic agent in the Product.&nbsp; For the avoidance of doubt, drug delivery vehicles, adjuvants, and excipients, and equipment used to administer a Product, will not be deemed an &#x201C;additional therapeutic agent&#x201D; for the purposes of the definition of &#x201C;Combination Product.&#x201D;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 12PT;TEXT-INDENT:72PT;LINE-HEIGHT:100%;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 12PT;">
<FONT STYLE="TEXT-INDENT:0PT;MARGIN-LEFT:0PT; PADDING-RIGHT:22PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	(n)
</FONT>
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="TEXT-INDENT:0PT;MARGIN-LEFT:0PT; PADDING-RIGHT:4PT;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	&#x201C;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;TEXT-DECORATION:UNDERLINE;">
	Non-Exclusive Compound
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	&#x201D; means a compound that is (a) a Mimetic of miR-34a or (b) a miR-34a Homologue, in each case other than the Current Compound.&nbsp;
</FONT>
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 12PT;TEXT-INDENT:72PT;LINE-HEIGHT:100%;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 12PT;">
<FONT STYLE="TEXT-INDENT:0PT;MARGIN-LEFT:0PT; PADDING-RIGHT:22PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	(o)
</FONT>
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="TEXT-INDENT:0PT;MARGIN-LEFT:0PT; PADDING-RIGHT:4PT;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	&#x201C;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;TEXT-DECORATION:UNDERLINE;">
	p53
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	&#x201D; means [***] protein encoded by the TP53 gene.
</FONT>
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 12PT;TEXT-INDENT:72PT;LINE-HEIGHT:100%;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 12PT;">
<FONT STYLE="TEXT-INDENT:0PT;MARGIN-LEFT:0PT; PADDING-RIGHT:22PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	(p)
</FONT>
</FONT>

<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;TEXT-DECORATION:UNDERLINE;">
	&#x201C;p53 Status
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	&#x201D; means [***].
</FONT>
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 12PT;TEXT-INDENT:72PT;LINE-HEIGHT:100%;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 12PT;">
<FONT STYLE="TEXT-INDENT:0PT;MARGIN-LEFT:0PT; PADDING-RIGHT:22PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	(q)
</FONT>
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="TEXT-INDENT:0PT;MARGIN-LEFT:0PT; PADDING-RIGHT:4PT;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	&#x201C;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;TEXT-DECORATION:UNDERLINE;">
	Phase II Trial
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	&#x201D; means any human clinical trial conducted on patients with the disease or condition being studied, the principal purpose of which is to determine (i) preliminary evidence of efficacy and safety and/or (ii) selection of the dose or dose range to be studied in a subsequent Phase II Trial(s) or Phase III Trial(s) for such product, as further described in 21 C.F.R. &#xA7;312.21(b) (including, any such clinical study in any country other than the United States).
</FONT>
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 12PT;TEXT-INDENT:72PT;LINE-HEIGHT:100%;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 12PT;">
<FONT STYLE="TEXT-INDENT:0PT;MARGIN-LEFT:0PT; PADDING-RIGHT:25PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	(r)
</FONT>
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="TEXT-INDENT:0PT;MARGIN-LEFT:0PT; PADDING-RIGHT:4PT;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	&#x201C;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;TEXT-DECORATION:UNDERLINE;">
	Phase III Trial
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	&#x201D; means a human clinical trial, the principal purpose of which is to establish safety and efficacy of the Product in patients with the disease being studied, as further described in 21 C.F.R. &#xA7;312.21(c) (including, any such clinical study in any country other than the United States).
</FONT>
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 12PT;TEXT-INDENT:72PT;LINE-HEIGHT:100%;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 12PT;">
<FONT STYLE="TEXT-INDENT:0PT;MARGIN-LEFT:0PT; PADDING-RIGHT:23PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	(s)
</FONT>
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="TEXT-INDENT:0PT;MARGIN-LEFT:0PT; PADDING-RIGHT:4PT;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	&#x201C;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;TEXT-DECORATION:UNDERLINE;">
	Pivotal Trial
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	&#x201D; means (i) a Phase III Trial or (ii) a Phase II Trial, which is designed and intended to be of a size and statistical power sufficient to serve as a pivotal study to support the filing of an application for drug regulatory approval.&nbsp;
</FONT>
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 12PT;TEXT-INDENT:72PT;LINE-HEIGHT:100%;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 12PT;">

</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;TEXT-DECORATION:UNDERLINE;">
	Quarter
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	&#x201D; means any respective period of three (3) consecutive calendar months ending on March 31, June 30, September 30 and December 31 of any Year.
</FONT>
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 12PT;TEXT-INDENT:72PT;LINE-HEIGHT:100%;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 12PT;">

</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">

</FONT>

</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 12PT;TEXT-INDENT:72PT;LINE-HEIGHT:100%;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 12PT;">
<FONT STYLE="TEXT-INDENT:0PT;MARGIN-LEFT:0PT; PADDING-RIGHT:23PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	(y)
</FONT>
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="TEXT-INDENT:0PT;MARGIN-LEFT:0PT; PADDING-RIGHT:4PT;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	&nbsp;&#x201C;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;TEXT-DECORATION:UNDERLINE;">
	Tier 1 Product
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	&#x201D; means a Product where (i) the assessment of p53 Status is on the approved label of such Product or (ii) Mirna (or its Sublicensee) Sells a [***], or (iii) Mirna (or its Sublicensee) requires or recommends that [***];&nbsp;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;TEXT-DECORATION:UNDERLINE;">
	provided
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;TEXT-DECORATION:UNDERLINE;">
	however
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	[***].
</FONT>
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 12PT;TEXT-INDENT:72PT;LINE-HEIGHT:100%;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 12PT;">

<TD VALIGN="TOP" STYLE="WIDTH:50.58%;BORDER-TOP:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;BORDER-LEFT:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;BORDER-BOTTOM:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;BORDER-RIGHT:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;PADDING:0PT;">
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;LINE-HEIGHT:100%;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 12PT;">

<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	(a)
</FONT>
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="TEXT-INDENT:0PT;MARGIN-LEFT:0PT; PADDING-RIGHT:4PT;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	Each of the Parties acknowledges and agrees that this Agreement has been diligently reviewed by and negotiated by and between them, that in such negotiations each of them has been represented by competent counsel and that the final agreement contained herein, including the language whereby it has been expressed, represents the joint efforts of the Parties hereto and their counsel.&nbsp;&nbsp;Accordingly, in the event an ambiguity or a question of intent or
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	interpretation arises, this Agreement shall be construed as if drafted jointly by the Parties and no

	presumption or burden of proof shall arise favoring or disfavoring any Party by virtue of the authorship of any provisions of this Agreement.

<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 12PT;TEXT-INDENT:72PT;LINE-HEIGHT:100%;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 12PT;">

	2.
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;;FONT-SIZE: 12PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;TEXT-INDENT:0PT;MARGIN-LEFT:0PT;PADDING:0PT 28.8PT 0PT 0PT;">

<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	GRANT OF LICENSE
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 12PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;LINE-HEIGHT:100%;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 12PT;">
<FONT STYLE="TEXT-INDENT:0PT;MARGIN-LEFT:0PT; PADDING-RIGHT:18PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	2.1.
</FONT>
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="TEXT-INDENT:0PT;MARGIN-LEFT:0PT; PADDING-RIGHT:4PT;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;TEXT-DECORATION:UNDERLINE;">
	Grant
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	.&nbsp;&nbsp;Subject to the terms of this Agreement, Rosetta hereby grants to Mirna,&nbsp;&nbsp;effective as of the Effective Date and during the Term:
</FONT>
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 12PT;TEXT-INDENT:72PT;LINE-HEIGHT:100%;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 12PT;">
<FONT STYLE="TEXT-INDENT:0PT;MARGIN-LEFT:0PT; PADDING-RIGHT:22PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	(a)
</FONT>
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="TEXT-INDENT:0PT;MARGIN-LEFT:0PT; PADDING-RIGHT:4PT;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	a non-assignable and non-transferable (except as permitted under Section 11.7), worldwide, exclusive license, with the right to authorize and grant Sublicenses under the Licensed Patents solely as set forth in
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;TEXT-DECORATION:UNDERLINE;">
	Section 2.3
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	, to: (i) make, have made, use, offer for sale, sell and import Products [***], and (b) perform processes covered by the Licensed Patents solely in connection the activities permitted under
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;TEXT-DECORATION:UNDERLINE;">
	subsection (a)(i)
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	; and
</FONT>
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-INDENT:72PT;LINE-HEIGHT:100%;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 12PT;">
<FONT STYLE="TEXT-INDENT:0PT;MARGIN-LEFT:0PT; PADDING-RIGHT:22PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	(b)
</FONT>
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="TEXT-INDENT:0PT;MARGIN-LEFT:0PT; PADDING-RIGHT:4PT;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	a non-assignable and non-transferable (except as permitted under Section 11.7), worldwide, non-exclusive license, with the right to authorize and grant Sublicenses under the Licensed Patents solely as set forth in
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;TEXT-DECORATION:UNDERLINE;">
	Section 2.3
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	, to: (i)&nbsp;&nbsp;make, have made, use, offer for sale, sell and import Products that [***] and (ii) perform processes covered by the Licensed Patents solely in connection with the activities permitted under
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;TEXT-DECORATION:UNDERLINE;">
	subsection (b)(i)
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	. &nbsp;
</FONT>
</FONT>
</P>

<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;LINE-HEIGHT:100%;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 12PT;">

	(collectively (a) and (b), the &#x201C;

</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="MARGIN-LEFT:8.16993464052288%;MARGIN-RIGHT:8.16993464052288%;">

<DIV STYLE="MARGIN-LEFT:8.16993464052288%;MARGIN-RIGHT:8.16993464052288%;">
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 12PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;LINE-HEIGHT:100%;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 12PT;">
<FONT STYLE="TEXT-INDENT:0PT;MARGIN-LEFT:0PT; PADDING-RIGHT:18PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	2.2.
</FONT>
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="TEXT-INDENT:0PT;MARGIN-LEFT:0PT; PADDING-RIGHT:4PT;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;TEXT-DECORATION:UNDERLINE;">
	Limited Exclusivity
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	.&nbsp;&nbsp;The License shall be exclusive solely for Products that [***], and nothing herein is intended to limit or prohibit Rosetta from granting licenses under the Licensed Patents to any Person for any other product or service.&nbsp;
</FONT>
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 12PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;LINE-HEIGHT:100%;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 12PT;">
<FONT STYLE="TEXT-INDENT:0PT;MARGIN-LEFT:0PT; PADDING-RIGHT:18PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	2.3.
</FONT>
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="TEXT-INDENT:0PT;MARGIN-LEFT:0PT; PADDING-RIGHT:4PT;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;TEXT-DECORATION:UNDERLINE;">
	Sublicenses
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	.&nbsp;
</FONT>
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 12PT;TEXT-INDENT:72PT;LINE-HEIGHT:100%;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 12PT;">
<FONT STYLE="TEXT-INDENT:0PT;MARGIN-LEFT:0PT; PADDING-RIGHT:22PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	(a)
</FONT>
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="TEXT-INDENT:0PT;MARGIN-LEFT:0PT; PADDING-RIGHT:4PT;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	The License includes the right for Mirna to grant to third parties a sublicense of the rights granted under the License (each, a &#x201C;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;TEXT-DECORATION:UNDERLINE;">
	Sublicensee
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	&#x201D; and such sublicense, a &#x201C;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;TEXT-DECORATION:UNDERLINE;">
	Sublicense
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	&#x201D;) in accordance with this
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;TEXT-DECORATION:UNDERLINE;">
	Section 2.3
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	, Mirna may not grant to such Sublicensee the right to grant any further Sublicenses, without the prior written consent of Rosetta, such consent of Rosetta not to be unreasonably withheld, and the prior written consent of Yeda in accordance with the Yeda Agreement.&nbsp;&nbsp;In the event Mirna desires to obtain such consents to grant a sublicense with the right to grant further sublicenses,[***]. Mirna shall at all times be responsible to Rosetta for its Sublicensee&#x2019;s compliance with the terms of this Agreement and the Yeda Agreement that are applicable to Rosetta&#x2019;s sublicensees and sub-sublicensees.&nbsp;
</FONT>
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 12PT;TEXT-INDENT:72PT;LINE-HEIGHT:100%;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 12PT;">
<FONT STYLE="TEXT-INDENT:0PT;MARGIN-LEFT:0PT; PADDING-RIGHT:22PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	(b)
</FONT>
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="TEXT-INDENT:0PT;MARGIN-LEFT:0PT; PADDING-RIGHT:4PT;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	Mirna agrees that each Sublicense shall be pursuant to a written sublicense agreement (a &#x201C;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;TEXT-DECORATION:UNDERLINE;">
	Sublicense Agreement
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	&#x201D;) which shall comply with the following:
</FONT>
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 12PT;TEXT-INDENT:108PT;LINE-HEIGHT:100%;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 12PT;">
<FONT STYLE="TEXT-INDENT:0PT;MARGIN-LEFT:0PT; PADDING-RIGHT:26PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	(i)
</FONT>
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="TEXT-INDENT:0PT;MARGIN-LEFT:0PT; PADDING-RIGHT:4PT;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	[***] terms hereof applicable to a Sublicensee, and [***], including
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	[***].
</FONT>
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 12PT;TEXT-INDENT:108PT;LINE-HEIGHT:100%;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 12PT;">
<FONT STYLE="TEXT-INDENT:0PT;MARGIN-LEFT:0PT; PADDING-RIGHT:24PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	(ii)
</FONT>
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="TEXT-INDENT:0PT;MARGIN-LEFT:0PT; PADDING-RIGHT:4PT;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	provide that: the Sublicense is personal to the Sublicensee and may not be sold, assigned, delegated or otherwise transferred or encumbered, in whole or in part, without the prior written consent of each of Rosetta and Yeda (such consent by Yeda to be sought and provided in accordance with Section 5.7.5 of the Yeda Agreement), and the Sublicensee may [***] of its receipt from the Sublicensee.&nbsp;&nbsp;For the avoidance of doubt, for purposes of this, Sublicense Agreement, a merger or consolidation of the Sublicensee with a third party where the Sublicensee is the surviving entity, or the acquisition of all or substantially all of the stock of control of the Sublicensee, shall not be deemed an assignment and the prior consent of Rosetta or Yeda is not required for such transaction .
</FONT>
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 12PT;TEXT-INDENT:108PT;LINE-HEIGHT:100%;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 12PT;">
<FONT STYLE="TEXT-INDENT:0PT;MARGIN-LEFT:0PT; PADDING-RIGHT:22PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	(iii)
</FONT>
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="TEXT-INDENT:0PT;MARGIN-LEFT:0PT; PADDING-RIGHT:4PT;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	provide that the Sublicensee shall have no right to grant further sublicenses;
</FONT>
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 12PT;TEXT-INDENT:108PT;LINE-HEIGHT:100%;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 12PT;">
<FONT STYLE="TEXT-INDENT:0PT;MARGIN-LEFT:0PT; PADDING-RIGHT:22PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	(iv)
</FONT>
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="TEXT-INDENT:0PT;MARGIN-LEFT:0PT; PADDING-RIGHT:4PT;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	provide that all Yeda-dependent provisions under the Sublicense will terminate in the event that the Yeda Agreement is terminated;
</FONT>
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-INDENT:108PT;LINE-HEIGHT:100%;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 12PT;">
<FONT STYLE="TEXT-INDENT:0PT;MARGIN-LEFT:0PT; PADDING-RIGHT:23PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	(v)
</FONT>
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="TEXT-INDENT:0PT;MARGIN-LEFT:0PT; PADDING-RIGHT:4PT;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	provide that the Sublicense will automatically terminate on the earlier of (x) the Expiration Date or (y) the date on which this Agreement expires or terminates for any reason,
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;TEXT-DECORATION:UNDERLINE;">
	provided
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	that in the event that this Agreement is terminated prior to the Expiration Date, and provided that a Sublicensee is at that time not in breach of its Sublicense Agreement, Rosetta agrees to enter into good faith negotiations with Sublicensee with respect to the provision of a direct license between Rosetta and such Sublicensee on substantially the same financial terms as those set forth herein and in the Sublicense Agreement, subject to the mutual agreement of Rosetta and the Sublicensee.
</FONT>
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;LINE-HEIGHT:100%;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">

<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">

<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 12PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;LINE-HEIGHT:100%;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 12PT;">
<FONT STYLE="TEXT-INDENT:0PT;MARGIN-LEFT:0PT; PADDING-RIGHT:18PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	2.4.
</FONT>
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="TEXT-INDENT:0PT;MARGIN-LEFT:0PT; PADDING-RIGHT:4PT;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;TEXT-DECORATION:UNDERLINE;">
	Limitations
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	.&nbsp;&nbsp;Mirna and its Sublicensees:
</FONT>
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 12PT;TEXT-INDENT:72PT;LINE-HEIGHT:100%;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 12PT;">
<FONT STYLE="TEXT-INDENT:0PT;MARGIN-LEFT:0PT; PADDING-RIGHT:22PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	(a)

</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="TEXT-INDENT:0PT;MARGIN-LEFT:0PT; PADDING-RIGHT:4PT;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	may exercise rights under the Licensed Patents solely as expressly permitted under the License;
</FONT>
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 12PT;TEXT-INDENT:72PT;LINE-HEIGHT:100%;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 12PT;">
<FONT STYLE="TEXT-INDENT:0PT;MARGIN-LEFT:0PT; PADDING-RIGHT:22PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	(b)
</FONT>
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="TEXT-INDENT:0PT;MARGIN-LEFT:0PT; PADDING-RIGHT:4PT;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	in connection with the exercise of their rights and compliance with their obligations under this Agreement, shall at all times strictly comply with all applicable Laws now or hereafter in effect, and make, obtain, and maintain in force at all times during the Term, all filings, registrations, reports, licenses, permits, and authorizations required under applicable Law to perform its obligations under this Agreement;
</FONT>
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 12PT;TEXT-INDENT:72PT;LINE-HEIGHT:100%;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 12PT;">
<FONT STYLE="TEXT-INDENT:0PT;MARGIN-LEFT:0PT; PADDING-RIGHT:23PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	(c)
</FONT>
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="TEXT-INDENT:0PT;MARGIN-LEFT:0PT; PADDING-RIGHT:4PT;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	acknowledges that Yeda is a co-owner of some or all of the Licensed Patents, that Rosetta and certain of its rights with respect to the licensing of the Licensed Patents is subject to the Yeda Agreement; and agrees that Mirna and its Sublicensee are obligated hereunder and agree to comply with all applicable terms of the Yeda Agreement, and that all Yeda-dependent provisions under this Agreement will terminate in the event that the Yeda Agreement is terminated.&nbsp;&nbsp;Mirna acknowledges that it has received and reviewed a copy of the Yeda Agreement prior to entering into this Agreement;
</FONT>
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 12PT;TEXT-INDENT:72PT;LINE-HEIGHT:100%;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 12PT;">

<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">

	acknowledges and agrees that Rosetta has no responsibility for the Products manufactured or sold or on behalf of Mirna or its Sublicensees, including no responsibility for the formulation or efficacy thereof, or the pricing thereof or any discounts or price reductions that may be applied with respect thereto .
</FONT>
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 12PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;LINE-HEIGHT:100%;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 12PT;">

<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	2.5.

<FONT STYLE="TEXT-INDENT:0PT;MARGIN-LEFT:0PT; PADDING-RIGHT:4PT;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT">

<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;TEXT-DECORATION:UNDERLINE;">
	Reservation of Rights
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	.&nbsp;&nbsp;Mirna acknowledges and agrees that: (a) except for the rights and licenses expressly granted under the License, it shall have no rights under this Agreement, by implication, estoppel or otherwise, in, under or to any Intellectual Property now or hereafter owned by Rosetta or any of its Affiliates, and all rights not expressly licensed or granted hereunder are expressly reserved by Rosetta and its Affiliates; (b) no license is granted hereunder to Mirna under any patent claim owned by Rosetta or its Affiliates other than the patents expressly listed in the definition of Licensed Patents; and (c) no license is granted under the Licensed Patents to any Entity other than Mirna.&nbsp;&nbsp;For the avoidance of doubt, and without limiting the foregoing Rosetta is under no obligation hereunder to deliver, and shall not deliver, to Mirna any data or know-how relating to the License Patents, including any data relating to results of the joint research conducted by Rosetta and Yeda under the Yeda Agreement (i.e., the &#x201C;Results&#x201D; as defined in the Yeda Agreement).
</FONT>

<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	.&nbsp;&nbsp;For each Quarter during the Term, within [***] ([***]) days of the end of such Quarter, Mirna and/or its Sublicensee, as applicable, shall provide to a written report, certified as correct by its chief financial
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;TEXT-DECORATION:UNDERLINE;">
	officer
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	or similar officer, setting forth the amount of Royalties and Sublicense Fees that accrued with respect to such Entity in the preceding Quarter and the manner in which such amounts were calculated in accordance with this Agreement.&nbsp;&nbsp;Such report shall set forth, for Mirna and each Sublicensee, on a Product-by-Product and jurisdiction by jurisdiction basis, the following applicable amounts that accrued during such Quarter:

	(b)

</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="TEXT-INDENT:0PT;MARGIN-LEFT:0PT; PADDING-RIGHT:4PT;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">

<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;TEXT-DECORATION:UNDERLINE;">
	Payments
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	.&nbsp;&nbsp;Together with such report, Mirna shall make a payment to Rosetta of all Royalties and Sublicense Fees payable for such Quarter, and provide written documentation, including [***].

</FONT>

<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 12PT;TEXT-INDENT:72PT;LINE-HEIGHT:100%;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 12PT;">
<FONT STYLE="TEXT-INDENT:0PT;MARGIN-LEFT:0PT; PADDING-RIGHT:23PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	(c)
</FONT>
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="TEXT-INDENT:0PT;MARGIN-LEFT:0PT; PADDING-RIGHT:4PT;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;TEXT-DECORATION:UNDERLINE;">
	Annual Reports
</FONT>

</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 12PT;TEXT-INDENT:108PT;LINE-HEIGHT:100%;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 12PT;">
<FONT STYLE="TEXT-INDENT:0PT;MARGIN-LEFT:0PT; PADDING-RIGHT:22PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	(iv)
</FONT>
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="TEXT-INDENT:0PT;MARGIN-LEFT:0PT; PADDING-RIGHT:4PT;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	other than a Challenge brought before the United States Patent and Trademark Office, any Challenge of any U.S. License Patents shall be litigated in the courts located in New York, New York, and the Parties agree not to challenge personal jurisdiction in that forum; and&nbsp;
</FONT>
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 12PT;TEXT-INDENT:108PT;LINE-HEIGHT:100%;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 12PT;">
<FONT STYLE="TEXT-INDENT:0PT;MARGIN-LEFT:0PT; PADDING-RIGHT:23PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	(v)
</FONT>
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="TEXT-INDENT:0PT;MARGIN-LEFT:0PT; PADDING-RIGHT:4PT;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	during the Term and during pendency of the Challenge, Milestone Payments and Royalties due hereunder will be [***], and their payment shall be [***], and starting on the date that the Challenge is won by Rosetta, Milestone Payments and Royalties due hereunder will be [***].
</FONT>
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 12PT;TEXT-INDENT:72PT;LINE-HEIGHT:100%;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 12PT;">
<FONT STYLE="TEXT-INDENT:0PT;MARGIN-LEFT:0PT; PADDING-RIGHT:23PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	(c)
</FONT>
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="TEXT-INDENT:0PT;MARGIN-LEFT:0PT; PADDING-RIGHT:4PT;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;TEXT-DECORATION:UNDERLINE;">
	Exception
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	.&nbsp;&nbsp;Notwithstanding anything to the contrary herein,
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;TEXT-DECORATION:UNDERLINE;">
	Sections 7.2(a) and 7.2(b)
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	shall not apply with respect to any Challenge asserted by Mirna or its Sublicensee, as the case may be, in response to or in defense of the prior assertion by Rosetta of a claim under such Licensed Patent against Mirna or such Sublicensee, as the case may be.
</FONT>
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 12PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;LINE-HEIGHT:100%;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 12PT;">
<FONT STYLE="TEXT-INDENT:0PT;MARGIN-LEFT:0PT; PADDING-RIGHT:18PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	7.3.
</FONT>
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="TEXT-INDENT:0PT;MARGIN-LEFT:0PT; PADDING-RIGHT:4PT;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;TEXT-DECORATION:UNDERLINE;">
	Prosecution of the Licensed Patents
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	.&nbsp;&nbsp;As between the Parties, Rosetta retains the sole and exclusive right to apply for, prosecute and defend the Licensed Patents, [***], subject to the [***].
</FONT>
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 6PT;LINE-HEIGHT:100%;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 12PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;LINE-HEIGHT:100%;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 12PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	7.4.
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;;FONT-SIZE: 12PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;TEXT-INDENT:0PT;MARGIN-LEFT:0PT;PADDING:0PT 21.6PT 0PT 0PT;">
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;TEXT-DECORATION:UNDERLINE;">
	Enforcement of Licensed Patents
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	.
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;TEXT-DECORATION:UNDERLINE;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 12PT;TEXT-INDENT:72PT;LINE-HEIGHT:100%;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 12PT;">
<FONT STYLE="TEXT-INDENT:0PT;MARGIN-LEFT:0PT; PADDING-RIGHT:22PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	(a)
</FONT>
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="TEXT-INDENT:0PT;MARGIN-LEFT:0PT; PADDING-RIGHT:4PT;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;TEXT-DECORATION:UNDERLINE;">
	Monitoring
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	.&nbsp;&nbsp;Mirna shall use commercially reasonable efforts to monitor Third Party infringement of the Licensed Patents with respect to any products competing with the Products, and shall provide notice to Rosetta if it learns of any alleged infringement.
</FONT>
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-INDENT:72PT;LINE-HEIGHT:100%;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 12PT;">
<FONT STYLE="TEXT-INDENT:0PT;MARGIN-LEFT:0PT; PADDING-RIGHT:22PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	(b)
</FONT>
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="TEXT-INDENT:0PT;MARGIN-LEFT:0PT; PADDING-RIGHT:4PT;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;TEXT-DECORATION:UNDERLINE;">
	Protection
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	. As between the Parties, Rosetta will have the sole and exclusive right, but not the obligation, for the protection of the Licensed Patents, including the initiation, defense, and management of any adversarial legal proceeding relating to the Licensed Patents, in any jurisdiction (including any declaratory judgment action, patent infringement action or opposition), at Rosetta&#x2019;s expense, subject to the reimbursement terms set forth in
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;TEXT-DECORATION:UNDERLINE;">
	Section 4.5
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	&nbsp;If Mirna provides Notice to Rosetta demonstrating that a Third Party is infringing any Licensed Patent in any jurisdiction by making or selling within Mirna&#x2019;s exclusive field, and following such Notice Rosetta elects not to enforce the Licensed Patents against such alleged infringer, then during the period such Third Party is so infringing the Licensed Patents (as
</FONT>
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;LINE-HEIGHT:100%;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 12PT;LINE-HEIGHT:100%;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 12PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">

</P>

	[***] Certain information in this document has been omitted and filed separately with the Securities and Exchange Commission.&nbsp;&nbsp;Confidential treatment has been requested with respect to the omitted portions.

<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	demonstrated by Mirna), [***],
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;TEXT-DECORATION:UNDERLINE;">
	provided
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	that the foregoing [***] shall not apply if Rosetta has elected not to proceed against the accused Third Party [***].&nbsp;&nbsp;Upon Rosetta&#x2019;s request, Mirna shall join in and/or provide cooperation with respect to any such action to enforce the Licensed Patents.&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;

<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 12PT 36PT;TEXT-INDENT: -36PT;LINE-HEIGHT:100%;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 12PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	8.
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;;FONT-SIZE: 12PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;TEXT-INDENT:0PT;MARGIN-LEFT:0PT;PADDING:0PT 28.8PT 0PT 0PT;">
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	CONFIDENTIALITY
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 12PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;LINE-HEIGHT:100%;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 12PT;">
<FONT STYLE="TEXT-INDENT:0PT;MARGIN-LEFT:0PT; PADDING-RIGHT:18PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	8.1.
</FONT>
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="TEXT-INDENT:0PT;MARGIN-LEFT:0PT; PADDING-RIGHT:4PT;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;TEXT-DECORATION:UNDERLINE;">
	Non-Disclosure
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	.&nbsp;&nbsp;Except as expressly permitted herein, a Party that receives disclosure of Confidential Information in connection with this Agreement (a &#x201C;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;TEXT-DECORATION:UNDERLINE;">
	Recipient
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	&#x201D;) from the other Party (a &#x201C;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;TEXT-DECORATION:UNDERLINE;">
	Discloser
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	&#x201D;) shall not disclose Discloser&#x2019;s Confidential Information, and shall prevent the disclosure of such information by Recipient&#x2019;s Representatives.&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&#x201C;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;TEXT-DECORATION:UNDERLINE;">
	Confidential Information
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	&#x201D; means (a) the terms of this Agreement and the terms of the Yeda Agreement and (a) the Reports provided by Mirna to Rosetta pursuant to
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;TEXT-DECORATION:UNDERLINE;">
	Section 4.4
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	.&nbsp;&nbsp;Recipient shall use Confidential Information of Discloser solely during the Term and as necessary for Recipient to comply with its obligations, and exercise its rights, in accordance with the Agreement.&nbsp;&nbsp;Recipient may disclose Confidential Information of Discloser solely to its employees and independent contractors under their direction and control (each, a &#x201C;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;TEXT-DECORATION:UNDERLINE;">
	Representative
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	&#x201D;), in each case solely to Representatives who are subject to a duty of non-use and non-disclosure at least as protective of Discloser and its Confidential Information as the provisions herein and who need to know such information in order for Recipient to reasonably exercise and perform its rights and obligations hereunder.&nbsp;&nbsp;Recipient also may disclose Discloser&#x2019;s Confidential Information as reasonably necessary in the operation of Recipient&#x2019;s business, to its financial advisors, accountants, attorneys and potential and actual investors and lenders under circumstances that reasonably ensure the confidentiality thereof.
</FONT>
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 12PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;LINE-HEIGHT:100%;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 12PT;">
<FONT STYLE="TEXT-INDENT:0PT;MARGIN-LEFT:0PT; PADDING-RIGHT:18PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	8.2.
</FONT>
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="TEXT-INDENT:0PT;MARGIN-LEFT:0PT; PADDING-RIGHT:4PT;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;TEXT-DECORATION:UNDERLINE;">
	Exclusions
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	.&nbsp;&nbsp;The confidentiality obligations and use limitations set forth in this Agreement shall not apply to any of Discloser&#x2019;s Confidential Information that Recipient can demonstrate with competent written proof: (a) was lawfully in Recipient's possession prior to disclosure by Discloser hereunder; (b) was generally known, in the trade or business in which it is practiced by Discloser and/or had entered the public domain, at the time of disclosure to Recipient hereunder, or becomes so generally known and/or entered the public domain after such disclosure, through no action or inaction of Recipient or its employees, agents or independent contractors or (c) has come into the possession of Recipient from a Third Party who is not known by Recipient to be under any obligation to maintain the confidentiality of such information.&nbsp;&nbsp;For purposes of this
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;TEXT-DECORATION:UNDERLINE;">
	Section&nbsp;8.2
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	, no combination of elements within the Confidential Information shall be deemed to be part of the public domain merely because the individual elements of such combination are part of the public domain, unless the entire combination itself, or the entire principle of use or operation of such combination (if any), is part of the public domain.&nbsp;&nbsp;In addition, no element within the Confidential Information shall be deemed to be a part of the public domain merely because it is embraced by more general information or data that is part of the public domain.
</FONT>
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;LINE-HEIGHT:100%;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 12PT;">
<FONT STYLE="TEXT-INDENT:0PT;MARGIN-LEFT:0PT; PADDING-RIGHT:18PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	8.3.
</FONT>
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="TEXT-INDENT:0PT;MARGIN-LEFT:0PT; PADDING-RIGHT:4PT;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;TEXT-DECORATION:UNDERLINE;">
	Terms of Agreement
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	.&nbsp;&nbsp;Notwithstanding anything to the contrary herein, the terms of this Agreement are the Confidential Information of both Parties, and may not be disclosed by one Party without the consent of the other Party, provided that both Parties may disclose to third Parties that Mirna has been granted a royalty-bearing license under the Licensed Patents to sell
</FONT>
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;LINE-HEIGHT:100%;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 12PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;LINE-HEIGHT:100%;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 12PT;">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 12PT;LINE-HEIGHT:100%;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 12PT;">

</P>

<P STYLE="MARGIN:24PT 0PT 0PT;LINE-HEIGHT:100%;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	[***] Certain information in this document has been omitted and filed separately with the Securities and Exchange Commission.&nbsp;&nbsp;Confidential treatment has been requested with respect to the omitted portions.

<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	Products, without disclosing any specific financial terms of this Agreement.&nbsp;&nbsp;Rosetta may issue a press release disclosing that Mirna has been granted a royalty-bearing license under the Licensed Patents to sell Products, and shall provide a copy of such press release to Mirna for its review and comment prior to issuance.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 12PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;LINE-HEIGHT:100%;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 12PT;">
<FONT STYLE="TEXT-INDENT:0PT;MARGIN-LEFT:0PT; PADDING-RIGHT:18PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	8.4.
</FONT>
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="TEXT-INDENT:0PT;MARGIN-LEFT:0PT; PADDING-RIGHT:4PT;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;TEXT-DECORATION:UNDERLINE;">
	Disclosures Required by Law
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	.&nbsp;&nbsp;In the event that Recipient is ordered to disclose Discloser's Confidential Information under applicable Law or pursuant to a judicial or governmental request, requirement or order, Recipient shall promptly provide written notice to Discloser of any required disclosure, which notice shall, to the extent reasonably practicable, be given a reasonable period of time in advance of such required disclosure.&nbsp;&nbsp;Upon Discloser&#x2019;s reasonable written request and at Discloser&#x2019;s sole cost, the Recipient shall take reasonable efforts to resist or limit such disclosure and assist Discloser in contesting such request, requirement or order or otherwise protecting Discloser's rights, such reasonable efforts shall be no less than efforts exerted by such Party to preserve the confidentiality of such Party&#x2019;s own similar Confidential Information.&nbsp;&nbsp;In the event either Party is required to file this Agreement with the Securities and Exchange Commission or any comparable non-United States regulatory agency, such Party shall apply for confidential treatment of this Agreement to the fullest extent permitted by applicable law, shall provide the other Party a copy of the confidential treatment request far enough in advance of its filing to give the other Party a meaningful opportunity to comment thereon, and shall incorporate in such confidential treatment request any reasonable comments of the other Party.&nbsp;&nbsp;If Discloser waives Recipient&#x2019;s compliance with this Agreement or fails to obtain a protective order or other appropriate remedy, Recipient will furnish only that portion of the Confidential Information that is legally required to be disclosed;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;TEXT-DECORATION:UNDERLINE;">
	provided
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	that any Confidential Information so disclosed shall maintain its confidentiality protection for all purposes other than such legally compelled disclosure.
</FONT>
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 12PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;LINE-HEIGHT:100%;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 12PT;">
<FONT STYLE="TEXT-INDENT:0PT;MARGIN-LEFT:0PT; PADDING-RIGHT:18PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	8.5.
</FONT>
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="TEXT-INDENT:0PT;MARGIN-LEFT:0PT; PADDING-RIGHT:4PT;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT">

</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;TEXT-DECORATION:UNDERLINE;">
	Yeda Confidential Information
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	.&nbsp;&nbsp;Notwithstanding anything to the contrary herein, Mirna and its Sublicensees shall maintain in confidence the Yeda Agreement and the terms thereof hereof (hereinafter, collectively referred to as the &#x201C;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;TEXT-DECORATION:UNDERLINE;">
	Yeda Confidential Information
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	"), except and to the extent that Mirna and its Sublicensee can prove that any such information or data is in the public domain at the date of the signing hereof or becomes part of the public domain thereafter (other than through a violation by Mirna or a Sublicensee of this or its obligation of confidentiality) and except with regard to that portion, if any, of the Confidential Information expressly released by Rosetta from this obligation of confidentiality by notice in writing to Mirna to such effect.&nbsp;&nbsp;Mirna and its Sublicensees undertake not to make any use of the names of Yeda, WIS and their employees, without Yeda&#x2019;s prior written consent.&nbsp;&nbsp;
</FONT>
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 12PT 36PT;TEXT-INDENT: -36PT;LINE-HEIGHT:100%;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 12PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	9.
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;;FONT-SIZE: 12PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;TEXT-INDENT:0PT;MARGIN-LEFT:0PT;PADDING:0PT 28.8PT 0PT 0PT;">
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	TERM AND TERMINATION
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 12PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;LINE-HEIGHT:100%;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 12PT;">
<FONT STYLE="TEXT-INDENT:0PT;MARGIN-LEFT:0PT; PADDING-RIGHT:18PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	9.1.
</FONT>
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="TEXT-INDENT:0PT;MARGIN-LEFT:0PT; PADDING-RIGHT:4PT;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;TEXT-DECORATION:UNDERLINE;">
	Term
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	.&nbsp;&nbsp;The term of this Agreement shall commence on the Effective Date and end on the date on which no patent applications comprised within the Licensed Patents are pending and all issued Licensed Patents have expired (the &#x201C;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;TEXT-DECORATION:UNDERLINE;">
	Expiration Date
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	&#x201D; and such term, the &#x201C;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;TEXT-DECORATION:UNDERLINE;">
	Term
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	&#x201D;) unless this Agreement is earlier terminated in accordance with this
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;TEXT-DECORATION:UNDERLINE;">
	Section 9
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	.
</FONT>
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;LINE-HEIGHT:100%;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 12PT;">
<FONT STYLE="TEXT-INDENT:0PT;MARGIN-LEFT:0PT; PADDING-RIGHT:18PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	9.2.
</FONT>
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="TEXT-INDENT:0PT;MARGIN-LEFT:0PT; PADDING-RIGHT:4PT;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;TEXT-DECORATION:UNDERLINE;">
	Termination At-will
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	.&nbsp; This Agreement may be terminated without cause by Mirna upon one hundred and twenty (120) days&#x2019; written notice,
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;TEXT-DECORATION:UNDERLINE;">
	provided
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	that the effective date of such
</FONT>
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;LINE-HEIGHT:100%;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 12PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;LINE-HEIGHT:100%;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 12PT;">

</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 12PT;LINE-HEIGHT:100%;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 12PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
</FONT>

<DIV STYLE="MARGIN-LEFT:8.16993464052288%;MARGIN-RIGHT:8.16993464052288%;">
<P>
<FONT SIZE="1">
</FONT>
</P>
<DIV STYLE="WIDTH:100%">

<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 12PT;LINE-HEIGHT:100%;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 12PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	termination (the &#x201C;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;TEXT-DECORATION:UNDERLINE;">
	Termination Date
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	&#x201D;) must be at least eighteen (18) months from the Effective Date, and
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;TEXT-DECORATION:UNDERLINE;">
	provided
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;TEXT-DECORATION:UNDERLINE;">
	further
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	that on the Termination Date Mirna pays to Rosetta an early termination fee as follows: (a) if as of the Termination Date Mirna has [***], the early termination fee shall be three million five hundred thousand dollars ($3,500,000) and (b) [***] the early termination fee will be two million dollars ($2,000,000). &nbsp;In the event of a termination under this
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;TEXT-DECORATION:UNDERLINE;">
	Section 9.2
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	, then the restriction on Challenges in
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;TEXT-DECORATION:UNDERLINE;">
	Section 7.2
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	&nbsp;will not survive such termination,
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;TEXT-DECORATION:UNDERLINE;">
	provided
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	that if following termination Mirna or its Sublicensee [***], then Mirna or its Sublicensee, as the case may be, will be required to [***],
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;TEXT-DECORATION:UNDERLINE;">
	provided
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;TEXT-DECORATION:UNDERLINE;">
	further
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	that [***] if Mirna has paid an early termination fee of three million five hundred thousand dollars ($3,500,000) in accordance with
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;TEXT-DECORATION:UNDERLINE;">
	subsection (a)
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	above, and (ii) [***] if Mirna has paid an early termination fee of two million dollars ($2,000,000) in accordance with
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;TEXT-DECORATION:UNDERLINE;">
	subsection (b)
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	above.
</FONT>

<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 12PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;LINE-HEIGHT:100%;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 12PT;">
<FONT STYLE="TEXT-INDENT:0PT;MARGIN-LEFT:0PT; PADDING-RIGHT:18PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	9.3.
</FONT>
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="TEXT-INDENT:0PT;MARGIN-LEFT:0PT; PADDING-RIGHT:4PT;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;TEXT-DECORATION:UNDERLINE;">
	Termination for Cause
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	.&nbsp;&nbsp;This Agreement may be terminated by Rosetta immediately upon written notice in the event of the occurrence of any of the following:
</FONT>
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 12PT;TEXT-INDENT:72PT;LINE-HEIGHT:100%;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 12PT;">
<FONT STYLE="TEXT-INDENT:0PT;MARGIN-LEFT:0PT; PADDING-RIGHT:22PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	(a)
</FONT>
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="TEXT-INDENT:0PT;MARGIN-LEFT:0PT; PADDING-RIGHT:4PT;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	Mirna is in material breach of this Agreement and fails to cure such material breach within forty (40) days of written notice of breach by Rosetta, and within fifteen (15) days for any breach of payment required hereunder.&nbsp;&nbsp;For the avoidance of doubt and without limitation, any failure to make timely payments due under this Agreement, a breach of
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;TEXT-DECORATION:UNDERLINE;">
	Section 7.2 (No Challenge)
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	, or any breach hereunder that is a material breach of the Yeda Agreement, is a material breach of this Agreement for purposes of this
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;TEXT-DECORATION:UNDERLINE;">
	Section 9.3(a)
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	.&nbsp;&nbsp;If Mirna [***], then the termination of this Agreement
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	[***]; or&nbsp;&nbsp;
</FONT>
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 12PT;TEXT-INDENT:72PT;LINE-HEIGHT:100%;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 12PT;">
<FONT STYLE="TEXT-INDENT:0PT;MARGIN-LEFT:0PT; PADDING-RIGHT:22PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	(b)
</FONT>
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="TEXT-INDENT:0PT;MARGIN-LEFT:0PT; PADDING-RIGHT:4PT;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	A court determines that Mirna is insolvent; a petition in bankruptcy is filed against Mirna and is consented to, acquiesced in or remains undismissed for thirty (30) days; or makes a general assignment for the benefit of creditors, or a receiver is appointed for Mirna, and Mirna does not return to solvency before the expiration of a thirty (30) day period.
</FONT>
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 12PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;LINE-HEIGHT:100%;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 12PT;">
<FONT STYLE="TEXT-INDENT:0PT;MARGIN-LEFT:0PT; PADDING-RIGHT:18PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	9.4.
</FONT>
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="TEXT-INDENT:0PT;MARGIN-LEFT:0PT; PADDING-RIGHT:4PT;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;TEXT-DECORATION:UNDERLINE;">
	Effect of Termination
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	.&nbsp;&nbsp;Upon expiration or termination of this Agreement for any reason:
</FONT>
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 12PT;TEXT-INDENT:72PT;LINE-HEIGHT:100%;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 12PT;">
<FONT STYLE="TEXT-INDENT:0PT;MARGIN-LEFT:0PT; PADDING-RIGHT:22PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	(a)
</FONT>
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="TEXT-INDENT:0PT;MARGIN-LEFT:0PT; PADDING-RIGHT:4PT;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	The License and all rights of Mirna and its Sublicensees with respect to the Licensed Patents, immediately will terminate;
</FONT>
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 12PT;TEXT-INDENT:72PT;LINE-HEIGHT:100%;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 12PT;">
<FONT STYLE="TEXT-INDENT:0PT;MARGIN-LEFT:0PT; PADDING-RIGHT:22PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	(b)
</FONT>
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="TEXT-INDENT:0PT;MARGIN-LEFT:0PT; PADDING-RIGHT:4PT;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	Within [***] ([***]) days of such expiration or termination, Mirna will provide a royalty report pursuant to
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;TEXT-DECORATION:UNDERLINE;">
	Section 4.4
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	, and make all payments due hereunder in respect of any accrued milestones or Products Sold during the Term; and
</FONT>
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-INDENT:72PT;LINE-HEIGHT:100%;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 12PT;">
<FONT STYLE="TEXT-INDENT:0PT;MARGIN-LEFT:0PT; PADDING-RIGHT:23PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">

<FONT STYLE="TEXT-INDENT:0PT;MARGIN-LEFT:0PT; PADDING-RIGHT:4PT;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT">

</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;TEXT-DECORATION:UNDERLINE;">
	Section 9.4
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	are without limitation of any other obligations of Mirna pursuant to this Agreement, and will not be affected by any dispute between the Parties with respect to this Agreement or any other matter.&nbsp;&nbsp;Upon termination of this Agreement as permitted hereunder there will be no refund, in whole or in part, of any payments hereunder already made.&nbsp;&nbsp;Expiration or termination of this Agreement shall not relieve Mirna of responsibility for any payment obligations or any liability for breach or otherwise accrued prior to the date of such expiration or termination.
</FONT>

<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;;FONT-SIZE: 12PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;TEXT-INDENT:0PT;MARGIN-LEFT:0PT;PADDING:0PT 21.6PT 0PT 0PT;">

<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 12PT;LINE-HEIGHT:100%;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 12PT;">

</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">

<FONT STYLE="TEXT-INDENT:0PT;MARGIN-LEFT:0PT; PADDING-RIGHT:13PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	10.1.
</FONT>
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="TEXT-INDENT:0PT;MARGIN-LEFT:0PT; PADDING-RIGHT:4PT;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;TEXT-DECORATION:UNDERLINE;">
	Mutual Representations and Warranties
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	. &nbsp;
</FONT>
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;;FONT-SIZE: 12PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;TEXT-INDENT:0PT;MARGIN-LEFT:0PT;PADDING:0PT 18PT 0PT 0PT;">
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	Each Party hereby represents and warrants to the other Party that:
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 12PT;TEXT-INDENT:72PT;LINE-HEIGHT:100%;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 12PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	(a)
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	it is duly organized, validly existing and in good standing under the laws of the jurisdiction of its organization;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 12PT;TEXT-INDENT:72PT;LINE-HEIGHT:100%;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 12PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	(b)
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	the execution, delivery and performance of this Agreement by such Party has been duly authorized by all requisite action under the provisions of its charter, bylaws and other organizational documents, and does not require any action or approval by any of its shareholders or other holders of its voting securities or voting interests;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 12PT;TEXT-INDENT:72PT;LINE-HEIGHT:100%;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 12PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	(c)
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	it has the power and authority to execute and deliver this Agreement and to perform its obligations hereunder;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 12PT;TEXT-INDENT:72PT;LINE-HEIGHT:100%;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 12PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	(d)
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	this Agreement has been duly executed and is a legal, valid and binding obligation on such Party, enforceable against such Party in accordance with its terms; and
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 12PT;TEXT-INDENT:72PT;LINE-HEIGHT:100%;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 12PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	(e)
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	the execution, delivery and performance by such Party of this Agreement and its compliance with the terms and provisions hereof does not and will not conflict with or result in a breach of or default under any obligation to any Third Party existing as of the Effective Date.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 12PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;LINE-HEIGHT:100%;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 12PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	10.2.
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;;FONT-SIZE: 12PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;TEXT-INDENT:0PT;MARGIN-LEFT:0PT;PADDING:0PT 18PT 0PT 0PT;">
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;TEXT-DECORATION:UNDERLINE;">
	Representations and Warranties of Rosetta
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	. &nbsp;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;;FONT-SIZE: 12PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;TEXT-INDENT:0PT;MARGIN-LEFT:0PT;PADDING:0PT 18PT 0PT 0PT;">
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	Rosetta hereby represents and warrants to Mirna that as of the Effective Date:
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 12PT;TEXT-INDENT:72PT;LINE-HEIGHT:100%;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 12PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	(a)
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	Rosetta is the co-exclusive owner of, or otherwise Controls pursuant to the Yeda Agreement, the Licensed Patents, all of which, to the best of its knowledge, are free and clear of any claims, liens, charges or encumbrances.&nbsp;&nbsp;For purposes of this
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;TEXT-DECORATION:UNDERLINE;">
	Section 10.2(a)
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	, &#x201C;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;TEXT-DECORATION:UNDERLINE;">
	Controls
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	&#x201D; means ability to grant to the other Party access to or a license under such item or right, as provided herein, without violating the terms of any agreement or other arrangements with any Third Party and without the prior consent of any Third Party.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 12PT;TEXT-INDENT:72PT;LINE-HEIGHT:100%;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 12PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	(b)
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	to Rosetta&#x2019;s knowledge, each Licensed Patent is in full force and effect;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 12PT;TEXT-INDENT:72PT;LINE-HEIGHT:100%;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 12PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	(c)
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	to its knowledge, the Licensed Patents issued and existing as of the Effective Date are valid and enforceable patents;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-INDENT:72PT;LINE-HEIGHT:100%;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 12PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	(d)
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	(i) there are no agreements between Rosetta and any Third Party existing as of the Effective Date under which Rosetta obtains rights in or to any Licensed Patents, other
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;LINE-HEIGHT:100%;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
</FONT>
</P>

<DIV STYLE="MARGIN-LEFT:8.16993464052288%;MARGIN-RIGHT:8.16993464052288%;">
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 12PT;LINE-HEIGHT:100%;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 12PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	than the Yeda Agreement, a true and complete copy of which has been provided to Mirna, (ii) except as provided in the Yeda Agreement no Third Party has any right, title or interest in or to, or any license under, any Licensed Patents, (iii) no rights granted by or to Rosetta or its Affiliates under the Yeda Agreement conflict with any right or license granted to Mirna or its Affiliates hereunder, and (iv) Rosetta and its Affiliates are in compliance in all respects with the Yeda Agreement.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 12PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;LINE-HEIGHT:100%;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 12PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	10.3.
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;;FONT-SIZE: 12PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;TEXT-INDENT:0PT;MARGIN-LEFT:0PT;PADDING:0PT 18PT 0PT 0PT;">
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;TEXT-DECORATION:UNDERLINE;">
	Rosetta Covenants
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	. &nbsp;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;;FONT-SIZE: 12PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;TEXT-INDENT:0PT;MARGIN-LEFT:0PT;PADDING:0PT 18PT 0PT 0PT;">
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	In addition to the covenants made by Rosetta elsewhere in this Agreement, Rosetta hereby covenants to Mirna that, from the Effective Date until expiration or termination of this Agreement, it will:
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 12PT;TEXT-INDENT:72PT;LINE-HEIGHT:100%;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 12PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	(a)
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	not enter into any agreement with a Third Party that conflicts with or limits (i) the rights granted to Mirna hereunder or (ii) Rosetta&#x2019;s ability to fully perform its obligations hereunder;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 12PT;TEXT-INDENT:72PT;LINE-HEIGHT:100%;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 12PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	(b)
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	not amend, terminate or otherwise modify the Yeda Agreement or consent or waive rights with respect thereto in any manner that (i) conflicts or the rights granted to Mirna hereunder, or (ii) adversely impacts Rosetta&#x2019;s ability to fully perform its obligations hereunder;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;TEXT-DECORATION:UNDERLINE;">
	provided
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	that in the event that Yeda terminates the License (as defined in the Yeda Agreement), except where such termination by Yeda arises directly or indirectly out of a breach by Mirna or its sublicensees of this Agreement or the Yeda Agreement, Rosetta hereby grants Mirna a worldwide, non-exclusive, transferable, assignable, with the right to authorize and grant Sublicenses in multiple tiers, to: (x) make, have made, use, offer for sale, sell and import Products that comprise or contain either the Current Compound or the Non-Exclusive Compounds and&nbsp;&nbsp;(y) perform processes covered by the Licensed Patents solely in connection with the activities permitted under
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;TEXT-DECORATION:UNDERLINE;">
	subsection (b)(x)
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 12PT;TEXT-INDENT:72PT;LINE-HEIGHT:100%;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 12PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	(c)
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">

</FONT>
</P>

	10.5.
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;;FONT-SIZE: 12PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;TEXT-INDENT:0PT;MARGIN-LEFT:0PT;PADDING:0PT 18PT 0PT 0PT;">

<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">

<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;TEXT-DECORATION:UNDERLINE;">
	Indemnification
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	.&nbsp;&nbsp;In recognition of the fact that Rosetta and Yeda will have no control of the activities of Mirna or its Sublicensees under this Agreement, Mirna agrees, and shall cause its Sublicensees, to agree as follows:
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 12PT;TEXT-INDENT:72PT;LINE-HEIGHT:100%;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 12PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	(a)
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	Mirna agrees to indemnify, defend and hold harmless Rosetta, Yeda, WIS, their Affiliates and their respective directors, officers and employees (hereinafter collectively the &#x201C;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;TEXT-DECORATION:UNDERLINE;">
	Indemnitees
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	&#x201D;) for any demands, liabilities, costs, losses, fines, damages or expenses (including legal costs and attorneys&#x2019; fees) of whatever kind or nature (&#x201C;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;TEXT-DECORATION:UNDERLINE;">
	Losses
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	&#x201D;) arising from a claim, action or lawsuit or other proceeding (&#x201C;Claim&#x201D;) that (i) is asserted by a third party and [***] in connection with the exercise of the rights and or the performance of the obligations of Mirna or any Sublicensee under this Agreement or any Sublicense Agreement, including the exercise of the License or any Sublicense, including [***] in connection with the development, manufacture, Sale or use of any of products or services by Mirna, any Sublicensee, or any Entity acting in the name of or on behalf of any of the foregoing, or [***], or [***] in connection with the exploitation or use by Mirna or any Sublicensee of the Licensed Patents or any data or results relating thereto; and (ii) any third party Claim that Rosetta is in breach of the Yeda Agreement that [***] arises out of a breach by Mirna or its sublicensees of this Agreement or the Yeda Agreement, except, in each case, to the extent caused by the gross negligence, recklessness or intentional acts of Rosetta or any Indemnitee or any material breach of a representation or warranty by Rosetta.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 12PT;TEXT-INDENT:72PT;LINE-HEIGHT:100%;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 12PT;">

	(b)
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">

</FONT>

</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
